de.must.appletserver
Class DataVariableChoice

java.lang.Object
  de.must.appletserver.RemoteElement
      de.must.appletserver.MustComboBox
          de.must.appletserver.VariableChoice
              de.must.appletserver.DataVariableChoice
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionInterpreter, AppletTalker, Remotable, RemoteContent, Storable, Updatable, java.awt.event.ItemListener, java.util.EventListener
public class DataVariableChoice
extends VariableChoice
implements Storable, java.awt.event.ItemListener

Combo box whose content is filled by a database table and which is linked to another database table which contains the key for the selected entry.

setEditable

public void setEditable(boolean editable)
Sets the flag that determines whether or not this component is editable. This means: value may be changed by user. It does not mean, that user may type in characters. To allow this, use setEditableForUserTyping. If the flag is set to true, this component becomes user editable. If the flag is set to false, the cannot change the text of this text component.

Overrides:
setEditable in class RemoteElement
Parameters:
editable - a flag indicating whether this component should be user editable
See Also:
VariableChoice#setEditableForUserTyping(boolean)

Specified by:

Parameters:
required - if true, input is mandatory; otherwise, input is not mandatory

selectAll

public void selectAll()
Selects all input of the component, if it is supported - e.g. in JTextField. Allows easy new input, because the previous value is reseted when the first key stroke occurs.

Specified by:
selectAll in interface RemoteContent
Overrides:
selectAll in class MustComboBox

setSelectedIndexAsEditBeginValue

public void setSelectedIndexAsEditBeginValue(int anIndex)

anIndex - the index of the item to select
